Title: Relates to stolen firearms, shotguns and rifles; repealer
Summary: Relates to criminal penalties for possession, theft, or sale of stolen firearms, shotguns and rifles; makes technical corrections to section 155.42 of the penal law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to stolen firearms, shotguns and rifles; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto, and relating to making technical corrections thereto
